languages.text: {n}Когда вы касаетесь мерзости, шепоты в ваших ушах становятся громче и... плотояднее. Вы незаметно убираете трофей — вовремя, потому что у вас за плечом возникает дознаватель.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда вы касаетесь мерзости, шепоты в ваших ушах становятся громче и... плотояднее. Вы незаметно убираете трофей — вовремя, потому что у вас за плечом возникает дознаватель.{/n}

languages.text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы касаетесь мерзости, шепоты в ваших ушах становятся громче и... плотояднее. Вы незаметно убираете трофей — вовремя, потому что у вас за плечом возникает дознаватель.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously — just in time before the interrogator appears behind your shoulder.{/n}

{n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously — just in time before the interrogator appears behind your shoulder.{/n}

{n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just in time before the interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

{n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just in time before the interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

{n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du die Abscheulichkeit berührst, wird das Flüstern in deinen Ohren lauter und ... blutrünstiger. Du steckst die Trophäe unauffällig ein, gerade noch rechtzeitig, bevor der Interrogator über deiner Schulter auftaucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du die Abscheulichkeit berührst, wird das Flüstern in deinen Ohren lauter und ... blutrünstiger. Du steckst die Trophäe unauffällig ein, gerade noch rechtzeitig, bevor der Interrogator über deiner Schulter auftaucht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand vous touchez l'abomination, les murmures dans votre tête deviennent plus puissants, plus... assoiffés de sang. Vous mettez subrepticement l'objet en poche, juste à temps avant que l'interrogateur n'apparaisse par-dessus votre épaule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand vous touchez l'abomination, les murmures dans votre tête deviennent plus puissants, plus... assoiffés de sang. Vous mettez subrepticement l'objet en poche, juste à temps avant que l'interrogateur n'apparaisse par-dessus votre épaule.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你刚刚触碰到那件可憎之物，耳边的低语就变得愈发响亮，愈发……嗜血。你刚刚把这件战利品藏进口袋，审讯官就出现了在你身后。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你刚刚触碰到那件可憎之物，耳边的低语就变得愈发响亮，愈发……嗜血。你刚把这件战利品摸进口袋，审讯官就出现了在你身后。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その忌まわしいものに触れると、耳元で囁く声はさらに大きくなり…声から滲む血の気も多くなった。こっそりと戦利品をしまった瞬間、インテロゲイターが肩越しに現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その忌まわしいものに触れると、耳元で囁く声はさらに大きくなり…声から滲む血の気も多くなった。こっそり戦利品をしまった瞬間、インテロゲイターが肩越しに現れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando tocas la abominación, los susurros en tus oídos se vuelven más fuertes y más... sanguinarios. Te embolsas el trofeo disimuladamente, justo antes de que el interrogador aparezca por detrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando tocas la abominación, los susurros en tus oídos se vuelven más fuertes y más... sanguinarios. Te embolsas el trofeo disimuladamente, justo antes de que el interrogador aparezca por detrás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Garabet şeye dokunduğun an kulağındaki fısıltıların sesi yükseliyor ve daha... Kana susamış hâle geliyorlar. Sorgucu tepende bitmeden hemen önce, ganimeti çaktırmadan cebe indiriyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you touch the abomination, the whispers in your ears become louder and more... bloodthirsty. You pocket the trophy surreptitiously, just before the Interrogator appears at your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu ifrite dokunduğun an fısıltıların sesi yükseliyor, gittikçe... Agresifleşiyorlar. Sorgucu tepene binmeden hemen önce, tam vaktinde ganimeti cebe indirmeyi başarıyorsun.{/n}
